summary: A very sneaky Khajiit follower who's as good a sneak that has ever snuck.  High level unarmed fighter who will silently ambush a target when asked to attack from behind as long as _you_ are not detected.
descriptionHtml:
Do'Shaar was a monk of the whispering fang cult but as M'aiq has said, after Khajiit arrive in Skyrim something strange happens to them.    While wandering the wilds of high rock he went native and started worshiping the old gods.

Recently he became convinced that it's his duty to follow the Dragonborn.  Do'Shaar was trained since birth to be an assassin.  He's very good at sneaking, fights silently and is a highly skilled unarmed fighter.  Of course a Khajiit is never truly unarmed as long as one's claws are sharp.

If you build up your own sneak skills you'll find he's extremely efficient at eliminating any lone adversary.   Work your way behind them then order Do'Shaar to attack.  If he can, he'll quietly dispatch his target without raising any alarms.

Do'Shaar requires nothing more than Skyrim with the official update.  Images show Do'Shaar with these mods (I think)  Muscular Khajiit Textures http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim /mods/40043/  and  Bulky Skeleton for Beast Race http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61132/

You'll find Do'Sharr in the Markarth Warrens.
author: GrumpyMule
